name: Lawn & Garden Care
description: Keep your yard healthy and green throughout the seasons.

templates.name: Lawn Aeration
templates.description: Allow air, water, and nutrients to penetrate grass roots.
instructions: Water the lawn the day before to soften soil.
Use a core aerator (rented or hired) to pull plugs of soil.
Go over the lawn in a crisscross pattern.
Leave soil plugs to decompose naturally.

templates.name: Sprinkler System Start-up
templates.description: Prepare irrigation system for the growing season.
instructions: Close drain valves.
Slowly open the main water valve to fill the system.
Run each zone manually to check for leaks or broken heads.
Adjust spray patterns to avoid watering driveways/sidewalks.
Set the timer for spring watering schedule.

templates.name: Sprinkler System Blow-out
templates.description: Remove water to prevent freezing pipes in winter.
instructions: Shut off main water supply to irrigation.
Connect air compressor to the blowout port.
Cycle through each zone until mist sprays out.
Open drain valves.
Turn off controller.

templates.name: Fertilize Lawn
templates.description: Feed your grass for lush growth.
instructions: Select appropriate fertilizer for the season.
Fill spreader.
Walk at a steady pace in parallel lines.
Water lightly after application if required by product.
safetyPrecautions: Keep pets off lawn until dry.

templates.name: Pressure Wash Deck/Patio
instructions: Clear all furniture and plants.
Sweep loose debris.
Use a wide spray tip (40 degree) to avoid damaging wood.
Keep nozzle moving constantly.
Let dry for 24-48 hours.
safetyPrecautions: Wear eye protection and closed-toe shoes.

templates.name: Seal/Stain Wood Deck
templates.description: Protect wood from rot and UV damage.
instructions: Ensure deck is clean and completely dry.
Replace any rotted boards.
Apply stain/sealer with a brush or roller.
Work in small sections to maintain a wet edge.
Wait 24 hours before walking on it.

templates.name: Inspect Deck Hardware
templates.description: Check for loose railings or structural issues.
instructions: Wiggle railings to check stability.
Tighten loose bolts or screws.
Check ledger board attachment to the house.
Look for rusted fasteners.

templates.name: Clean Patio Furniture
instructions: Mix mild soap and warm water.
Scrub frames and cushions.
Rinse thoroughly with a hose.
Let dry in the sun.
